4307920.name: Loot Goblin: An Idle Adventure
4307920.description:
You've defeated the weakest Goblin Boss . . .

By Goblin law, you've acquired his Camp and Notoriety.

You're now the weakest Goblin Boss.

Train your army, loot your foes and get stronger.

It's your time to become the greatest Goblin Boss!

Your adventure begins now.

In Loot Goblin: An Idle Adventure, your main resource is your Goblins. Improve them, train them and command them to get more Loot and Notoriety, the two components to a great Goblin Boss.

  • Training: Train each Goblin in your army into one of several unique classes or assign them as Trainers to improve a class over time.

  • Dungeons: Send in your army setup to defeat enemies and acquire Loot. Heal your injured goblins and send them back in.

  • Loot: Gear up to strengthen your army and Boss.

  • Shop: Spend gold on powerful potions and buffs.

  • Bounty: Complete achievements and hunts to get rewards.

  • Notoriety: Reset your progress and use your Notoriety Tree to get plenty of upgrades for your Goblins.

  • Boss: Challenge other Goblin Bosses to become the strongest!
